DbStorage.SqlSearchInHistory: SELECT TOP 5 * FROM DBT.ApiInspectorWhiteStone WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (@userName ISNULL OR UserName = @userName) AND (@filter ISNULL OR [Key] LIKE '%' + @filter + '%') AND (@filter ISNULL OR [Value] LIKE '%' + @filter + '%')  ORDER BY LastExecutionTime DESC
DbStorage.SqlDeleteFromHistory: DELETE FROM DBT.ApiInspectorWhiteStone WHERE UserName = @userName AND (@filter ISNULL OR [Key] LIKE '%' + @filter + '%') AND (@filter ISNULL OR [Value] LIKE '%' + @filter + '%')  ORDER BY LastExecutionTime DESC
DbStorage.SqlReadFromHistory: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM DBT.ApiInspectorWhiteStone WHERE StorageKey = @storageKey
DbStorage.SqlExistsInHistory: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM DBT.ApiInspectorWhiteStone WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE StorageKey = @storageKey
